title: Understanding Pesticide Labels | From the ground Up

subtasks: Access label information if difficult to read
Find label equivalents via internet search
Ensure product label is brought to medical facility
Note hazards to animals on label
Note hazards to humans on label
Check impact on bees according to label

tasks.task: The main task when it comes to using pesticides is reading the label, so that's MAINTASK. Then, subtasks under that would be identifying what information is on the label that you need to pay attention to. So active ingredient, first-aid, hazards, directions for use, storage, and disposal. Also, if the label is hard to read, go online to find a better version. So maybe those are subtasks. Hmm.
Read and understand pesticide instructions. The subtasks under that would include:
Safely use pesticides around the home
Read pesticide label and gather additional information (if needed)
Properly store and dispose of pesticides
Safely use pesticides around the home
Safely use pesticides around the home
